description: This file implements functions related to a 'Xsink' object in a network service context, including getting and setting associated socket objects, attaching and detaching the sink. It is part of a larger network service software system, specifically handling the state and interface of a sink object that interacts with Xsocket objects.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscXsinkGetXsocket(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves the current Xsocket object associated with the sink.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscXsinkSetXsocket(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hXsocket)
methods.description: Sets or updates the Xsocket object associated with the sink.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscXsinkAttach(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hXsocket)
methods.description: Attaches a socket to the sink (functionality not implemented, placeholder returns success).

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscXsinkDetach(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Detaches the socket from the sink (functionality not implemented, placeholder returns success).
